articles.author: Charles Maynes
articles.title: What Is the Relationship Between Russia and the U.S. Now? - NPR
articles.description: The sometimes cold and often frozen relationship between Russia and the U.S. has gotten a lot warmer since President Trump took office. And even though the American drive to broker a peace deal between Russia and Ukraine may be faltering, the desire to do big…
